item.description:
Enjoy being single and live a full life with relationships, fun, work, growth and creativity. Learn the many different lifestyles and tips to enjoy your life now rather than later. Be happy now!

 

HerbPearce, M.Ed, is a relationship coach, therapist and phone coach for personal growth and relationship issues. He's a personality types expert, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living.

7:30 gather - bring vegetarian food to share

Playshop at 8pm

Party from 9:30 -11

781 648 3737

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager and Wollaston and West St.
item.why: You are single and want to enjoy life even more! Meet other singles. Invite other singles!
item.name: Be Single and Enjoy It! Playshop - Singles Party too!
